channel.title: [PORTFORWARDING HELP!] Please Help! [REQ]
channel.description: Ok So Ive tryed everything and I know how to portforward but heres my problem I cant get onto my router well I can but it appears my router has 2 accounts 1 account is user account which can only read things on the router page and the other account is admin account which can make and save changes so this is where my portforwarding problem comes in I cant open the port on the user account that I login to the router with and my mum wont tell me the admin account info for the router cause she doesnt want me to know it! so if anyone thinks they can help I beg you teamview me!!! My msn is GabrielPeriera190@live.co.uk Thanks!!!

item.title: [PORTFORWARDING HELP!] Please Help! [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:2, topic:379001”][quote author=Eclipsedz link=topic=474857.msg3472148#msg3472148 date=1295377985]
Ok So Ive tryed everything and I know how to portforward but heres my problem
I cant get onto my router well I can but it appears my router has 2 accounts
1 account is user account which can only read things on the router page
and the other account is admin account which can make and save changes
so this is where my portforwarding problem comes in I cant open the port on the user account
that I login to the router with and my mum wont tell me the admin account info for the router
cause she doesnt want me to know it!
so if anyone thinks they can help I beg you teamview me!!! My msn is GabrielPeriera190@live.co.uk
Thanks!!!
[/quote]

If your mummy won’t give you the router USER/PASS then you’re not going to be able to login, if so, try checking here; www.portforward.com .[/quote]

I would have posted this exact thing but he beat me to it >.< Seriously dude, if you cant log in don’t bother. How about this, heres an idea, use your BRAIN, theres gotta be one in there since you were able to register… ASK YOUR MOTHER IF SHE CAN TYPE PASS FOR YOU AND WATCH YOU DO IT SO THAT YOU ARE ABLE TO PORTFORWARD AND SHE CAN BE AT EASE KNOWING THATS ALL YOU ARE DOING.

Quit being suck a D!CK people here have tried to help you, you are the one thats lazy because you can’t figure such an easy thing out as asking your mom…
/facepalm/

Read full topic

If I was all of the above, your basically saying i’m retarded and we all know who’s the retard here. So if you acctually checked that amazingly useful site maybe you’ll be able to fix your “little” problem. And it’s not my fault my mummy is better then me on computers.

kthxbai.

item.title: [PORTFORWARDING HELP!] Please Help! [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Eclipsedz Eclipsedz
item.description:
@Eclipsedz wrote:

Ok So Ive tryed everything and I know how to portforward but heres my problem
I cant get onto my router well I can but it appears my router has 2 accounts
1 account is user account which can only read things on the router page
and the other account is admin account which can make and save changes
so this is where my portforwarding problem comes in I cant open the port on the user account
that I login to the router with and my mum wont tell me the admin account info for the router
cause she doesnt want me to know it!
so if anyone thinks they can help I beg you teamview me!!! My msn is GabrielPeriera190@live.co.uk
Thanks!!!

If your mummy won’t give you the router USER/PASS then you’re not going to be able to login, if so, try checking here; www.portforward.com .

…Thanks… FOR NOTHING… if you want to critisize me then tbh mate this community/forum gets shit with people like you who sit on their asses critisizing other people because your too lazy to do something yourself or actually help… yet your small mind cant comprehend your useless and you fail… I may not be able to portforward but mate tbh if thats the kind of response your gonna give then you should stfu and go do something [In real life] - Not on runescape you no lifer… Thanks agen for nothing…
